name: Age of Empires 3: The Asian Dynasties Save File

description: AGE3YSAV files are located in the \​My Documents\​My Games\​Age of Empires 3\​Savegame\​ directory.
The Age of Empires 3 game without expansion packs uses the .AGE3SAV extension for save files. The first expansion, Age of Empires 3: The WarChiefs, uses the .AGE3XSAV file extension.
